In Israel, more young people are getting COVID-19 now compared to before vaccines were available. Before vaccines, about 27% of cases were in people 19 years old or younger, and 25% were in people 50 years old or older. Today, with vaccines, about 47% of cases are in people 19 years old or younger, and only 11% are in people 50 years old or older. About 90% of people 50 years old or older who are infected with COVID-19 have received at least one dose of the vaccine.
